protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the third step of glycolysis, the phosphorylation of fructose-6-phosphate (F6P) by ATP to generate fructose-1,6-bisphosphate (FBP) and ADP.

go_class.description: phosphotransferase activity, alcohol group as acceptor
